title: What were these islands north of Saurashtra and how did they disappear ?
selftext:
First, greetings to you all and thanks for the time you give to read this post and, fortunately, answer me if you can.

So, to expose my question, in multiple depictions of ancient Inda (at the time of Alexander the Great campaigns, at least), north of Saurashtra there are two islands. However, in maps from the modern era to modern satellite maps show no islands, and instead, a territory entirely part of the continent.

My question, thus, is what were these islands ? Did they really exist ? And if they did, how did they "rejoin" with the continent ?

(I highlighted the islands on a map that showed them)

https://preview.redd.it/ovrldp8v7aya1.jpg?width=800&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=2eb7759fc6f0397b0eaed318f294acb2eb2a6717
comments: Are you sure it isn't a printing error?
No, Kutch used to be an island before
